Name: Terasys API
Description:
Below are all the endpoints available in the API. Make sure to read all the descriptions to get a better idea of how the endpoints function.

Only requests sent over HTTPS are valid.

ExpectedHeaders.Name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
ExpectedHeaders.Value: Authorization, Access-Control-Allow-Headers, Origin, Accept, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Access-Control-Request-Method, Access-Control-Request-Headers

Parameters.Name: Body
